values:
How do I always manage to make a fool out of myself? SERIOUSLY?
God, I am an idiot.
And I'm the first to admit it.

=[
I was wrong. Yet again.
Just when it gets good...
Why do I do this to myself?
How could I be so wrong?
I was so sure!
:(
sdlkfjlsadkfjlsadfjl;ksadjlksdafj
I don't understand. I can't comprehend this.

"What you don't know can't hurt you.
it's what we suspect that screws everything up."

you just don't understand do you? everytime i talk to you it gets worse. the little butterflies, my stomach dropping, the spinning, the feeling like everything is all right in the world. these never stop. they keep coming back.

Will this ever stop? On and off. On and off.
This scares me.

I'm afraid.

Uh oh. I think I've let myself fall too far yet again. =/
He gave me a little, and I took a lot.
But it was so hard not to....
I don't know what to think. But I know what I want.... you.

Easy come, easy go.



but. <3 for you.

Dear you,
We're not 5, please stop acting like it. If you really do like me then just fucking tell me and stop dicking around. It's so annoying, it's not cute anymore. You've just become an asshole to me, and it's not funny at all. Stop. Do what you please. Be with me or not. Make a choice already and stick with it. 
- Me

Dear other you,
Mixed signals, much? I dunno. You confuse me so much, and we need to hang out. I never know what you're thinking. Sometimes it seems like we're having the greatest conversation ever and other times it's just blah. and horrible. and blah. Gahh.

Stupid boys... Why do they have to be so damn confusing?!?
...I obviously should not be awake at 2:00 AM. My brain is completely gone.

Gah! Come home! I miss you. I need you. 
I can't last this long without you, why do you make me??


Why are all boys assholes?
I know that's not true but one is and it makes the rest look horrible.
Sorry, but it does.
Goddamn I miss him.

And I really want the cutie-pie to start talking... MORE! <3

Admit it. We flirt with each other.
We have so much fun with each other.
We laugh with each other
and we even try to be with each other.
And I believe that we secretly love each other.

I smile when I pass him in the halls.
I smile when he calls.
I smile at the littelest things he does.
I smile when he doesn't even realize it.
I smile when he gets online.
I smile when I think about him.
Basically, I smile all the time.

He isn't my boyfriend; but I love
his hugs, his smile, his advice, his
love, his kindness, and the times
we laugh together. I guess I fell
in love with our friendship

Today is a winding road
Thats taking me to places that I didnt want to go, whoa
Today in the blink of an eye
Im holding on to something and I do not know why I tried

I tried to read between the lines
I tried to look in your eyes
I want a simple explanation; what Im feeling inside
I gotta find a way out
Maybe theres a way out

Your voice was the soundtrack of my summer
Do you know youre unlike any other?
Youll always be my thunder, and I said
Your eyes are the brightest of all the colors
I dont wanna ever love another
Youll always be my thunder
So bring on the rain
And bring on the thunder

Today is a winding road
Tell me where to start and tell me something I dont know, whoa
Today Im on my own
I cant move a muscle and I cant pick up the phone, I dont know

And now I'm itching for the tall grass
And longing for the breeze
I need to step outside, just to see if I can breathe
I gotta find a way out
Maybe theres a way out

Your voice was the soundtrack of my summer
Do you know youre unlike any other?
Youll always be my thunder, and I said
Your eyes are the brightest of all the colors
I dont wanna ever love another
Youll always be my thunder
So bring on the rain
And bring on the thunder

Yeah Im walking on a tightrope
I'm wrapped up in vines
I think Ill make it out but you just gotta give me time
Strike me down with lightning
Let me feel you in my veins
I wanna let you know how much I feel your pain

Today is a winding road
Thats taking me to places that I didnt want to go, whoa

Your voice was the soundtrack of my summer
Do you know youre unlike any other?
Youll always be my thunder, and I said
Your eyes are the brightest of all the colors
I dont wanna ever love another
Youll always be my thunder
So bring on the rain
And bring on the thunder

Your voice was the soundtrack of my summer
Do you know youre unlike any other?
Youll always be my thunder
So bring on the rain
Oh baby bring on the pain
And listen to the thunder

I honestly don't know what I want.
I THOUGHT I did.
But HE came back and screwed it all up.
Actually, yes, I know what I want.
It's HIM.
But not the right him.

Somehow I knew it was too good to be true.
I actually don't know why I'm saying this. 
Yesterday, I just because really depressed about all this.
Stupid PMS.

"your like the image of the perfect girl to me"
ok. so i better see this guy again. and it better be soon.

"because i love thinking about her, if she thought of me they way i do of her, id be happy beyond words"
He's so sweet.
Hot damn, this better work out.
I really, really want this to happen.

I remember the first time
that I really looked
you in your eyes.
I was thinking one thing
summer loving has never
been this irresistably, unforgettable

I did it, I finally did it.

"i feel like the luckiest guy alive"
=]

He's so sweet.
=]

So there's a new boy. Well, I'm not sure if you can call him new, cause he's been a long time coming. Seriously, maybe the longest in a while.
=]
He's my favorite. Seriously, I've never had a guy be such a flirt with me and be so cute about it. =]
I love it so much. =]
"your cute"
I don't care that he can't type and use contractions. Fuck contractions.

I almost did it today... so close. 
But I chickened out. 
It also doesn't help that I change my mind every 5 seconds.

"It`s funny how you can
grow away from your friends ,
when just a few years ago
they were the most important
people in your life"

"nothing is worse  than MISSING AN
OPPORTUNITY that could change your life. "

"imperfection is beauty.
madness is genius.,
&& it`s better to be 
absolutely ridiculous than
absolutely boring
&& when it comes down to it
i let them think what they want;
if they care enough to bother
with what i do.,
then i`m already better than them.,
-- Marilyn Monroe "

*sigh*
You missed your chance, so why am I the one regretting it the most?
I can only think of "What if, What if?"
I guess I should be happy with what I have...
I'm trying to convince myself that everything happens for a reason, but maybe I'm supposed to fix this. 
Oh lordy.
I was NEVER good with decisions.

I'm perfectly fine and totally happy where I am. With the guy I'm with. With everything.
Then I talk to HIM. And HE changes EVERYTHING. I think it's love, but not with the right person, or maybe it is the right person. I don't know. Everything gets so messed up when I talk to him. We just seem right, even when we're fighting. I still like him a lot, maybe love. No, I don't think it's love, but it's a hell of a lot of liking. Why? Why? Why?

"Don't ruin what you have by wanting  what
you don't: remember that what you have now
was once something you only hoped  for."

"I have had many "best friends" walk in and out of my life, and I have been hurt many times by these "friends", but each experience has made me stronger, a better person and friend. And now, I have finally found a group of people who I can consider my friends, my crew -- with whom I don't have to pretend to be someone I'm not, and who accept me for me, and who, oddly enough, like me because of who I am."

I need a record of this summer... This is gonna be it. Somewhere I can let it all out and no one will read it. =] Perfection. Everything comes out easier online. Typing is easier than talking or writing.

I had the most amazing conversation with JohnS today. We just get each other and always have a good time. I wish I hadn't completely killed every chance we ever had with each other. Then again, it's not like he helped. I've got to stop with the regrets, though. Everything happens for a reason. I want to believe that so badly. My moods change so much. One minute I'm fine with the way everything is and the next all I want to do is change it. I don't know. I guess this is how it is, you know being 15 and all. I'm gonna let things play out and see how it goes. Everything is fine for the most part so far. 

Cam's party tomorrow should be fun. I really hope so at least.

....wow. i haven't used this in a while.
but now i'm bored and procrastinating so i feel like saying everything on my mind in a place where no one will ever read it. =]

so yeah. i'm in the same place i was last time i posted.
well. not entirely. 
with the whole boys situation: yes, nothing has changed. well, something might have changed, but he hasn't made a move yet and who knows if he ever will. the boy just needs balls.
with the whole friends situation: well that's a horse of a different color. i've pretty much completely changed my group of friends. of course, i still talk to my old friends, but not as much. it's a good thing. they like me more now, which is kinda weird, but they were never really normal. my new group is amazing. i get along with everyone (pretty much) and it's a party. they're just so much more like me. i'm kinda in the middle now, but closer to my new group of friends.... now i'm just confusing myself...

it's weird to be saying this, but for the first time in a VERY long time, i am truly happy. i'm completely content with my life. and i REALLY like it. sure, things could happen that would make me happier, but for now i'm good. =]

I haven't updated this in a while. 
I hate when I'm talking to people and they put up an away that they know will make me feel bad and let me know that I'm being excluded. =/ Maybe I'm paranoid, but maybe not.
